title: Citi Philippines Launches Debit Card for Banking Clients
summary: Manila - Citi Philippines recently launched the Citi Debit Card, designed to provide its banking clients enhanced security features and convenience of shopping at millions of merchants worldwide.
tag-1: Citi Philippines Launches Debit Card for Banking Clients
tag-2: Manila – Citi Philippines recently launched the Citi Debit Card, designed to provide its banking clients enhanced security features and convenience of shopping at millions of merchants worldwide.
tag-3: In partnership with Visa, the Citi Debit Card functions as both an ATM card and a debit card. The debit card is upgraded with EMV chip technology allowing clients to withdraw from all ATMs in the Philippines and from more than 20,000 Citibank ATMs worldwide with no extra fees. Travelers also benefit from this convenience as they can now withdraw cash at 2 million ATMs that accept Visa cards globally with this Citi Visa Debit card.
tag-4: "Citi is pleased to offer another first to our clients in the Philippines. We remain committed to using the latest technology to provide our customers world class financial products and services," Citi Country Officer Batara Sianturi said.
tag-5: Consumer Business Manager Bea Tan also commented at the launch. She says, "With the introduction of the Citi Debit Card, we offer improved security for our clients' peace of mind, as well as flexibility to choose how they access their cash - from making transactions via ATM, or shopping at retail stores, or dining at their favorite restaurants."
tag-6: For greater peace of mind, the Citi Debit Card uses a dynamic authentication feature, which greatly reduces fraud at the point of sale. In addition to this, an SMS alert is sent to the cardholder's mobile phone after every transaction - an additional notification feature that is unique in the Philippines.
tag-7: Visa Country Manager for the Philippines and Guam Iain Jamieson said: "More Filipinos are starting to use Visa debit cards at home and overseas because it's safer and more convenient than carrying large amounts of cash or paying with checks. That's why we've partnered with Citi, a leader in the Philippines, to introduce the Citi Visa Debit Card. When someone loses cash, it's gone forever. However, Visa Debit cards can be quickly replaced, and all transactions are protected with the same high level of security as Visa Credit cards."
tag-8: All Citibank and Citibank Savings Inc. clients are entitled to a free upgrade of their current ATM to a Citi Visa Debit Card. With the new Citi Visa Debit Card, Citi accountholders enjoy a retail purchase limit of up to US$2,300 (PhP100,000) while Citigold customers can spend up to US$4,600 (PhP200,000).
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
